text.section: If there is a claim pending against the Unsatisfied Claim and Judgment Fund Board or its successor, that claim is a lien against the amount deposited in favor of the Unsatisfied Claim and Judgment Fund Board or its successor.

Neither subsection (a) of this section nor any other provision of law may be construed to prevent the use of the deposit:
To satisfy any final judgment rendered against the depositor that has been docketed within 3 years from the date of the accident and not assigned to the Unsatisfied Claim and Judgment Fund or its successor; or
In the payment of any claim on the instruction of the depositor.
